attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government cares so much about Global Warming, which in my opininon is natural anyway, surely they should build a Severn barrage? I live near the Severn and I think it would be a good way to get renewable energy. Instead of raising taxes and putting emission zones up, build a Severn barrage, and don't be hypocrites by building airports but not renewable energy sources.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
